titles.title: A resolution designating Chairman of the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.
A resolution designating Chairman of the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates Senator Robert Menendez as Chairman of the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.
